goals__remit:
ASFE, paraffinic fuels for Europe, is a unique initiative launched in 2006 bringing together automotive and fuel supply companies to promote the use of synthetic fuels. Neste, Shell and Toyota form the core membership. 
 
ASFE’S objectives 
•    To promote the usage and development of paraffinic diesel fuels in Europe for improved air quality, increased diversity of supply, high quality diesel replacement and in the case of BTL and HVO reduced CO2 emissions. 
•    To raise stakeholder awareness of the multiple benefits of paraffinic fuels and their contribution to a more sustainable European transport. 
•    To create a favourable policy environment at both an EU and national level to stimulate the introduction and market penetration of paraffinic fuels.
